About me

My name is Dmitri

My motto - developer as a lifestyle. My sense of design and style, combined with logical skills and understanding of algorithms, help me to create. Discipline, responsibility, analytical skills, focus on results allow me to perform work at a high level. I make sure to consistently meet deadlines and to effectively communicate with my clients to avoid misunderstandings. I constantly learn and explore new tools to stay on top of technology trends.

Skills

My tools

HTML5

Is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web

CSS3

is a language that is used to illustrate the look, style, and format of a document written in any markup language

Sass

Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world

Gulp

Gulp is yet another tool to automate repetitive tasks in web development.

Java Script

Is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS

Jquery

Is a JavaScript library designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax

React

Is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Declarative: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs

Node.js

As an asynchronous event-driven JavaScript runtime, Node.js is designed to build scalable network applications

Mongo.db

Is a non-relational document database that provides support for JSON-like storage

GitHub

GitHub is a cloud-based service that helps developers store and manage their code, as well as track and control changes to their code

Visual Studio Code

Visual Studio Code is powerful source code editor which runs on your desktop and is available for Windows, macOS and Linux

Figma

Figma is a browser-based UI and UX design application, with excellent design, prototyping, and code-generation tools
